channel.title: Server status page, Working or not?
channel.description:
Hello, Reece8982 here. This is a thread for whoever doesn't want to go to another page to see if server status page is working. I will update as much as possible. Please, if you would, DO NOT spam. This is also telling you if its working for other people,too. It may be helpful sometimes.
Server status page is currently: Not working.
Error?: The serverstatus page is temporarily out of service, sorry for any inconveniance this has caused.
How long till fixed?(estimate): Within a couple days. Temporary.
Mods tell if this is right section or not, and i will post this there.

item.title: Server status page, Working or not?

Read full topic

item.source: Server status page, Working or not?

item.title: Server status page, Working or not?
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

This script should test it. enjoi. All creds to Ron for making it, me for editing.

[code]{=========================================================================]
[ Script Name: Check For Mopar v.1 by Ron ]
[ ]
[ Instructions: ]
[ 1. Go to www.moparisthebest.com/smf ]
[ 2. Agree to the Terms of Service to get that cookie. ]
[ 3. Close out of the window, and start this script. ]
[ 4. If prompted, make sure to click on Always Permit for this URL. ]
[ 5. You will be alerted when Mopar is connected and online. ]
[ ]
[ Note: Also, to end the script quickly, press F12. ]
[ ]
[ This script is for moparisthebest.com/smf and moparisthebest.com/smf but ]
[ you can use this for any other website you want. Just make sure to set ]
[ up the settings correctly. ]
[ ]
[ Used SafeDisguise procedure by yakman! Good job man! ]
[=========================================================================}

Program CheckForMopar;

Const
// How long to wait inbetween each check in seconds.
// Default is 10.
WaitInSeconds = 10;

// The script will check for this word, and if it’s found, then Mopar
// is online. This word is case sensitive. This word works for
// moparisthebest.com/smf and moparisthebest.com/smf
CheckWord = ‘inconvience’;

// What link to check to see if it’s online. Easy copy and paste is below.
// http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf
// http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf
ForumURL = ‘http://moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php’;

Var
b, i : Integer;

// The Minimize Procedure will Minimize Scar by pressing Ctrl+M.
// Made by Ron.
Procedure MinimizeToTray;
Begin
KeyDown(17);
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘m’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘m’));
KeyUp(17);
End;

// Procedure to disguise scar using ThreadSafeCall by yakman!
Procedure DisguiseScar(Disguise: String);
Begin
GetApplication.Title := Disguise;
GetSelf.Caption := Disguise;
End;

// Procedure to disguise scar using ThreadSafeCall by yakman!
Procedure SafeDisguise(disguise : String);
Var
p : TVariantArray;
Begin
SetArrayLength(p,1);
p[0] := Disguise;
ThreadSafeCall(‘DisguiseScar’,p);
End;

Procedure WriteStatus(Status : String);
Begin
ClearDebug;
WriteLn(‘Mopar Status: ‘+Status+’.’);
WriteLn(’ Checked a total of ‘+IntToStr(b)+’ time(s).’);
WriteLn(’ Wait Time: ‘+IntToStr(WaitInSeconds)+’ seconds.’);
End;

Procedure Check_For_TOS;
Var
a : String;
Begin
// If it finds the word mopar in the ForumURL then do this.
If(Not(pos(‘mopar’, ForumURL) = 0))Then
Begin
a := GetPage(ForumURL);
If(Not(Pos(‘agree to everything stated below’, a) = 0))Then
Begin
WriteLn(‘Error: TOS Found!’);
WriteLn(’ Please get the TOS cookie before running this script for more’);
WriteLn(’ accurate results!’);
GetApplication.MESSAGEBOX(‘Please get the TOS cookie before running this script for more accurate results!’, ‘Error: TOS Found’, 0);
GetApplication.RESTORE;
GetApplication.BRINGTOFRONT;
TerminateScript;
End Else
Begin
WriteLn(‘TOS not detected.’);
End;
End;
End;

Procedure Check_Connection;
Var
c : String;
Begin
// Store text of moparisthebest.com/smf into variable c.
c := GetPage(ForumURL);
// If the length of c is greater than 5, then do this. Otherwise, mopar
// is not even online to display a message so why bother checking for
// a word.
If(Length© > 5)Then
Begin
// If the pos of the word is not 0 (aka if the word is found) then
// Website is online!
If(Not(Pos(CheckWord, c) = 0))Then
Begin
GetApplication.RESTORE;
GetApplication.BRINGTOFRONT;
WriteStatus(‘Connected’);
GetApplication.MESSAGEBOX(‘Website is online!’, ‘Yay!’, 0);
TerminateScript;
End;
// If the pos of the word is 0 (aka if the word is not found) then
// Website is not online!
If(Pos(CheckWord, c) = 0)Then
Begin
b := b + 1;
WriteLn(‘Didn’‘t find the word.’);
WriteStatus(‘Disconnected’);
End;
End Else
Begin
b := b + 1;
WriteStatus(‘Disconnected’);
End;
SafeDisguise(‘Checked a total of ‘+IntToStr(i)+’ time(s)’);
End;

// Wait loop…
Procedure Start_The_Wait;
Begin
// Set i to equal WaitInSeconds.
i := WaitInSeconds;
// Keep looping until i is below 1.
Repeat
// Change status every second to show how many seconds remaining.
Status(‘Checking again for Mopar in ‘+IntToStr(i)+’ second(s).’);
i := i - 1;
Wait(1000);
Until(i < 1)
Status(‘Running Script…’);
End;

Begin
ClearDebug;
// Change report width to 0.
ChangeReportWidth(0);
//Check_For_TOS;
MinimizeToTray;
// Loop until F12 is down. In the loop, the script will terminate itself
// once the website is online.
Repeat
Check_Connection;
Start_The_Wait;
Until(IsFKeyDown(12))
End.[/code]

Read full topic
